extendedInfo.description: The Fuel Rewards Networkâ¢ (FRN) program is a free loyalty program that helps you save money on fuel when you shop and dine with participating grocery stores, convenience stores, restaurants, online merchants and more.SAVE MONEY ON FUEL** Earn at least 5Â¢/gal in Fuel RewardsÂ® savings for every $50 you spend across nearly 700 online merchants in our Online Mall.** Earn 10Â¢/gal for every $50 you spend dining at more than 10,000 participating restaurants, clubs and bar locations nationwide. ** Select eCoupons and earn rewards when purchasing the eCoupons items at participating grocery and drug stores.** Earn rewards when you purchase specially marked convenience store products, like fountain sodas, car washes and auto services using your FRNâ¢ Card at participating Shell stations.** Redeem your rewards when you insert your FRN Card at the pump before you pay -- and watch your fuel price drop!Saving on fuel has never been easier or more mobile -- and it's free to join!START SAVING MONEY ON FUEL FOR FREE * Download the FRN App.* Join the Fuel Rewards Network, and request that we mail you an FRN Card. If you're already a member, log in to your FRN Account.* Find nearby locations on the map where you can earn rewards. * Locate fuel stations, check retail gas prices -- and see your personal fuel price based on the rewards you've earned. * Check your rewards balance, expiring rewards, view your transactions, and more. Itâs simple. Start earning and saving on fuel today!* Participation varies by market--------------------The FRN App was just launched. Please give us your feedback in order to make it better: android@fuelrewards.com. We want to know what you think. Thanks!--------------------

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Neal Daringer

reviews.title: Nice idea
reviews.comment: Not well executed. Map shows all kind of crap and it\'s hard to find actual shell stations. Especially since the icons are so tiny.
reviews.author: Michael Netherton

reviews.title: Technically it works
reviews.comment: The only reason I can think of to install this - quickly locating participating gas stations and tapping them to navigate - is something the app does not do. :(
reviews.author: Jason Bock

reviews.title: Seems good so far
reviews.comment: Pulls local prices from specific gas stations and shows on a map all places you get deals (basically just Shell, Bi-Lo, and participating restaurants). Wish it also pulled other gas station prices like Gas Buddy, as sometimes other stations gas is cheaper even with the Shell discounts.
reviews.author: dylan murphy

reviews.title: Booooo
reviews.comment: Worked fine for about a week, I could look up my rewards to see IF I wanted to use them right away or have time to accumulate more... now it just force closes and doesn\'t allow me to log in, goes straight to my phone\'s home screen. Annoying so I\'m uninstalling, lmk when it\'s fixed!!
reviews.author: natalie weeks

reviews.title: Great service
reviews.comment: My credit isnt the best so I as a single mom appreciate the help with savings ... dont shop to much but would like you to add more places like fridays and food lion to name a couple But otherwise this is great
reviews.author: carmen matias

reviews.title: Nice but....
reviews.comment: It has a nice concept but force closes a lot.  Will need to fix then I\'ll give it a higher rating.
reviews.author: Daniel Ware

reviews.title: Never works
reviews.comment: Never works! Can\'t ever find locations!
reviews.author: Nikki Sparkman

reviews.comment: I like the concept but it wont let me put my MC on there
reviews.author: LAURA WRIGHT

reviews.title: Great savings.
reviews.comment: Love it. I use it in conjunction with my reward perks from Bi-Lo.
reviews.author: Lucrecia Tolbert

reviews.title: Not fully functional
reviews.comment: \'Locations\' causes run time error consistently. Uninstalling and just going to use the rewards card and account without it. I use GasBuddy to find stations near my location anyway.
reviews.author: Mel Darklyter

reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Seanna McAllister - Toatley

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Convenient for when I need to save on gas!
reviews.author: Lafayette Williams

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: Love
reviews.author: jose garcia

reviews.title: Love it! Love it! Love it!
reviews.comment: Cant help but to love saving $ on gas!
reviews.author: chastity masterton

reviews.title: SaveSaveSave
reviews.comment: These days living expenses are so high that when a great opportunity comes sround that helps me save i never let pass me by.
reviews.author: angelique mack

reviews.title: Helpful but has GPS issue
reviews.comment: Helpful app, but after going back to devices home screen (pressing the home button or the back button) the FRN app constantly uses GPS until phone is restarted or app is forced to stop.   Had to uninstall it for that reason.. also granted the app should obtain your location, but does it really have to constantly do it again every 2 seconds or so?
reviews.author: Scott Leister

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: But you can\'t scan your card thru the app you still have to use the physical card. Fix and 5*s
reviews.author: Jackson Mergler

reviews.title: Very poor app
reviews.comment: won\'t locate a station near me and stay open takes forever to load when it decides to do so. I\'m uninstalling!
reviews.author: Maggie Wilks

reviews.title: DROID Bionic with ICS
reviews.comment: FC when I try to log in
reviews.author: Adam Rutledge
